name: Don't Look Back (itch) (Rosemary Games)
description:
In 1987, 

the murder of 4 high school

students shook America to it's core.

They were found dead in the Salem National Park.

It was believed to be a serial killing,

but those who fall into local superstitions

believe she was killed by the

spirit of the woods that haunts the park

nearing the town of Salem. A statewide manhunt

was inducted to search for their killer,

but to no such success.

To this day, it remains one of America's

most chilling mysteries.

-----------------------------------------------

*Don't Look Back is currently In-Development

Includes:

  1. Genuine Pixel Horror Experience
  2. Art from POP: Slasher Forest
  3. Music by the Radical Karl Casey of White Bat Audio on YouTube!
  4. Multiple Endings (More in development...)
  5. Elements based around "Missing 411" and "I'm a Search and Rescue Officer..." Stories

Goals:

  • Future Updates & Fixes
  • Upwards of 10 endings
  • Real-Time Lighting
  • Steam Release (Full Release)
  • Priced Release
